paint

Class CCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
        • paint.ECanvas
          • paint.CCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class CCanvas
extends ECanvas
    This class lets the user use important functions that allows drawing shapes and using methods which are not defined in the inherited class.

      This Method is allows the redo actions ,by adding image to last image

      This Method is responsible for undoing actions that are taken by the user, by pop-ing them off of the undo stack, and setting the canvas to be the next image in line, so to speak.

      • updateDimensions

        public void updateDimensions()
        This method runs only when the Images are opened, or when the canvas is resized, and sets the canvas width to be the proper size.

        public void undo()
        This Method is responsible for undoing actions that are taken by the user, by pop-ing them off of the undo stack, and setting the canvas to be the next image in line, so to speak.

        public java.lang.Double[] convPairToArray(javafx.util.Pair pts)
        Changes pair of double arrays; convert the output polygon to use javafx polyon.
        Parameters:
        pts - A pair of the X and Y points, both in the proper order
        Returns:
        A Double[] of the X and Y points
